Comments_List: I learned about lexico-semantic structures and how sentences are processed in the mind.

The workload is extremely high and I think this can be improved by doing exercises in section rather than using section as more of an extra lecture. I think working on exercises in section would prepare students more for their homework as well.

No. The coursework was very high, and at times the direction of the course was very unclear. Communication with the professor was often delayed if via email and feedback was given often with small margins for assignment deadlines.
